ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Write access to this field pushes data to Transmit FIFO

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Read access to this field pops data from Receive FIFO

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: slave_addr_l_reg
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Lower 7-bit slave address

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: slave_addr_h_reg
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: For 10-bit address mode only. Lower 3-bit slave address

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: start
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Starts the I2C transaction. This is asserted after the MPU has finished writing to all configuration registers

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: abort
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Stops an I2C transaction currently in progress

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: reset
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Set this bit to 1 to reset this I2C Master Controller

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: repeated_start
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Causes I2C controller to omit the generation of a stop condition following the completion of a transaction. Subsequent transaction will be a repeated start.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: byte_cnt
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of data bytes for the current transaction

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: clk_presc_high
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The upper three bits of the clock prescaler

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: trx_mode
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Sets the read or write operation on the I2C bus

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ack_mode
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Sets the behavior of ACK during the last byte of a master read transaction

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: addr_mode
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Selects the addressing mode either 7 or 10 bits

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: bus_speed_mode
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Selects setup time for Repeated START Condition and setup time for STOP Condition

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: clk_presc_low
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Lower 8-bit value of divisor in clock prescaler register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_ready_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when Receive FIFO is empty and receives a data word from SPI interface.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_afull_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:displayName: Receive FIFO Almost Full Interrupt Status
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when the amount of data words in Receive FIFO changes from 'RX FIFO Almost Full Flag' - 1 to 'RX FIFO Almost Full Flag'.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_full_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when RX FIFO full status changes from not full to full state.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_empty_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when the last data in Transmit FIFO is popped-out, causing the FIFO to become empty.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_aempty_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:displayName: Transmit FIFO Almost Empty Interrupt Status
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when the amount of data words in Transmit FIFO changes from 'TX FIFO Almost Empty Flag' - 1 to 'TX FIFO Almost Empty Flag'.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_full_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when Transmit FIFO changes from not full state to full state.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tr_cmp_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when the number of transmitted words via SPI interface reaches the TGT_WORD_CNT_REG.target_word_cnt setting value.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_ready_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enabled bit corresponded to Receive FIFO Ready Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_afull_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:displayName: Receive FIFO Almost Full Interrupt Enable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enabled bit corresponded to Receive FIFO Almost Full Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_full_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enabled bit corresponded to Receive FIFO Full Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_empty_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enabled bit corresponded to Transmit FIFO Empty Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_aempty_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:displayName: Transmit FIFO Almost Empty Interrupt Enable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enabled bit corresponded to Transmit FIFO Almost Empty Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_full_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enabled bit corresponded to Transmit FIFO Full Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tr_cmp_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt enabled bit corresponded to Transfer Complete Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_ready_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to Receive FIFO Ready Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_afull_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:displayName: Receive FIFO Almost Full Interrupt Set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to Receive FIFO Almost Full Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_full_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to Receive FIFO Full Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_empty_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to Transmit FIFO Empty Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_aempty_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:displayName: Transmit FIFO Almost Empty Interrupt Set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to Transmit FIFO Almost Empty Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_full_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to Transmit FIFO Full Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tr_cmp_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt set bit corresponded to Transfer Complete Interrupt Status.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: timeout_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status of bit asserts when scl_io is hold for SCL_TIMEOUT_REG.timeout_val times the programmed SCL low period.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: arb_lost_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when I2C Master IP Core loses arbitration.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: abort_ack_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when an I2C Master IP Core aborts an ongoing transaction because the host writes 1'b1 to CONTROL_REG.abort.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: nack_error_int
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This interrupt status bit asserts when NACK is received when expecting an ACK during data phase and address phase.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: timeout_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Defines the Interrupt enable of bit corresponding to SCL Timeout Interrupt.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: arb_lost_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Defines the interrupt enable bit corresponding to Arbitration Lost Interrupt.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: abort_ack_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Defines the interrupt enable bit corresponding to Transaction Abort Acknowledgement Interrupt.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: nack_error_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Defines the interrupt enable bit corresponding to NACK Error Interrupt.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: timeout_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Defines the Interrupt set of bit corresponding to SCL Timeout Interrupt.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: arb_lost_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Defines the interrupt set bit corresponding to Arbitration Lost Interrupt.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: abort_ack_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Defines the interrupt set bit corresponding to Transaction Abort Acknowledgement Interrupt.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: nack_error_set
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Defines the interrupt set bit corresponding to NACK Error Interrupt.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_empty
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit reflects the empty condition of Receive FIFO.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_afull
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit reflects the almost full condition of Receive FIFO.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rx_fifo_full
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit reflects the full condition of Receive FIFO.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_empty
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit reflects the empty condition of Transmit FIFO.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_aempty
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit reflects the almost empty condition of Transmit FIFO.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tx_fifo_full
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit reflects the full condition of Transmit FIFO.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: SCL_TIMEOUT_REG
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: SLC Timeout Register specifies the timeout value for SCL Timeout.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: timeout_val
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Specifies the timeout value for SCL timeout
